src_original: ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavantīti na /
ato hetorna śāśvatataḥ //  kathaṃ punarnocchedataḥ?  na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu maraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,  nāpyaniruddheṣu /
tasminneva samaye aupapattikāśca skandhāḥ punarbhavanti,  prādurbhavanti,  tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat /
